title: The Seinfeld Reunion - A Conversation with Colin
description:
Rumors are swirling about a Seinfeld Reunion. Here's what it should be.

Today's topic was submitted by @_Irish95. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.
